entry.title: Lotus Biscoff & Go Biscuit Spread and Breadsticks - 45g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus
Type: Snacks
Price: 4.99

Creamy Like No Other

   Lotus Biscoff has an unforgettable flavour that is now available in snack form on the go! Delicious, creamy Lotus Biscoff spread paired with crunchy breadsticks meant for dipping, it's the perfect treat to add to any lunch - or to just take with you wherever you might get the munchies. It's the light, feel-good snack you won't be able to put down!


(1 packet) 45g

entry.title: Crunchy Lotus Cookie Butter - 380g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus
Type: Snacks
Price: 10.49

The Original Caramelized Biscuit

Nothing beats this creamy, buttery spread of Biscuit caramelized cookies. Enjoy 57% of the original Lotus Biscoff Cookies in a fun Cookie Butter with crunchy cookie pieces! Pair this with toast, fruit, crackers, or whatever your heart desires. It’s even a heavenly treat in milkshakes, smoothies, and the perfect addition to a baking recipe. Sit back and enjoy a delicious creamy flavour melt away in your mouth. Look forward to breakfast again with irresistible Lotus Spread.

  • No Artificial Colours or Added Flavours
  • Vegan
  • Vegetarian

1 jar - 380g / 13.4oz

Ingredients

Biscoff Cookies (Wheat Flour, Sugar, Vegetable Oils (contains one or more of soybean oil, sunflower oil, canola oil, palm oil), Soy Flour, Brown Sugar Syrup, Sodium Bicarbonate (Leavening), Salt, Cinnamon), Canola Oil, Sugar, Soy Lecithin, Citric Acid.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data. We cannot be held responsible for the accuracy of ingredients or nutritional information provided, nor liable for any reactions caused by the products we sell.

entry.title: Lotus Biscoff Cookie Butter - 400g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus
Type: Snacks
Price: 10.49

The Original Caramelized Biscuit

... turned into a spread

Lotus Biscoff Cookie Butter

Nothing beats this creamy, buttery spread of Lotus Biscoff caramelized cookies. Enjoy 57% of the original Lotus Biscoff Biscuits jam-packed into each jar of spreadable Cookie Butter!

Pair this heavenly cookie butter with toast, fruit, crackers, or whatever your heart desires. It’s a heavenly treat in milkshakes, smoothies, and the perfect addition to a baking recipe. The options to enjoy this European delicacy is endless!

Sit back and enjoy as the buttery creaminess melts away in your mouth. Look forward to breakfast again with irresistible Lotus Spread.

  • No Artificial Colours or Added Flavours
  • Vegan
  • Vegetarian

1 jar - 40 g

Novelty Treats Shipped to Canada & the USA!

Ingredients

Original caramelized biscuits (Wheat flour, Sugar, Vegetable oils (palm oil, Canola Oil), Brown sugar, syrup, Sodium bicarbonate, Soy flour, Salt, cinnamon), Canola oil, Sugar, Soy Lecithin, Citric acid. Contains Wheat, Soy.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: M&Ms Crispy Chocolate Spread UK - 350g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Snacks
Price: 12.99

Spread some sweetness.

M&Ms Crispy Chocolate Spread has little crunchy M&M pieces and smooth milk chocolate. This delicious treat comes from the UK with love. Try some today!

350 g Jar

Ingredients:

Sugar, Vegetable Oils (Rapeseed, Palm), Skimmed Milk Powder, Fat-Reduced Cocoa Powder (5.7%), Hazelnuts (4.8%), Coloured Crispy Balls (4%) (Rice Flour, Wheat Flour, Shea Oil, Palm Oil, Colouring Foodstuff Concentrates (Safflower, Spirulina, Paprika, Radish, Apple, Lemon, Carrot, Black Currant), Sugar, Dextrose, Rapeseed Oil, Salt, Emulsifier: Lecithins Soya)), Lactose, Sweet Whey Powder (Milk), Emulsifier: Lecithins (Sunflower), Natural Flavouring

entry.title: Reese's Creamy Peanut Butter Spread - 18oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Snacks
Price: 8.99

Spread the Love...and Reese's

It’s like we scooped out a bunch of REESE’S Peanut Butter Cups and filled jars with that delicious peanut butter so you can make sandwiches and stuff. Use it on PB&J, spoon it into your favourite dessert recipe or enjoy a spoonful straight from the jar.

510 g
